contents: Article 4 (Composition) ① The committee is composed of the following members. Revised 2017. 4. 3., 2019. 1. 31. 1. 1 chairperson 2. Up to 3 vice-chairmen *3. 11 to 15 members (including chairperson and vice-chairperson) ② Subcommittees may be established and operated to achieve the purpose of the committee. ③ In order to ensure smooth operation of the committee, there will be one secretary, who will be the head of the department that oversees the evaluation work of member sport organizations.
